metadata.title: CVE-2021-47167 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:NFS: Fix an Oopsable condition in __nfs_pageio_add_request()Ensure that nfs_pageio_error_cleanup() resets the mirror array contents,so that the structure reflects the fact that it is now empty.Also change the test in nfs_pageio_do_add_request() to be more robust bychecking whether or not the list is empty rather than relying on thevalue of pg_count.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
